contexts.context: "What tricks can your troupe <mark>perform</mark>?" asked the wizard to the lead acrobat, Rhunen Zebavi...
...we know no tricks. All the realizations of acrobacy we <mark>perform</mark> are real with no illusions. We wish we knew tricks...
"Very well, what realizations of acrobacy can you <mark>perform</mark>?" asked Gothren with what almost looked like a smile....
...," said Rhunen Zebavi. "Are you ready for us to <mark>perform</mark> for you now? I hadn't told you yet about our latest...
...few hours later. "Why do we bother with these backwoods <mark>performances</mark>?"
While few Bosmer <mark>perform</mark> Arkay's rituals when burying the dead, the more primitive Bosmer...
..., Family, Masters, and all that is good. <mark>Perform</mark> holy quests and bring luster to the Temple. Never transgress...
...loyalty. Finding a councilor to sponsor an outlander often involves <mark>performing</mark> a great service for the prospective sponsor.
